name: SSF2
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 2
subtitle: Clark Level
notes:
**Note 1**:  Code the Clark level as documented in the pathology report.

**Note 2**:  Record only for squamous cell carcinoma of skin of eyelid.  For other histologies, use code 987, not applicable.
rows:
Clark level I
In situ, intraepidermal, intraepithelial, noninvasive 
Basement membrane of epidermis is intact

Clark level II
Papillary dermis invaded

Clark level III
Papillary-reticular dermal interface invaded

Clark level IV
Reticular dermis invaded

Clark level V
Subcutaneous tissue invaded (through entire dermis)

OBSOLETE DATA CONVERTED V0200
See code 988 

Not applicable for this site
Not applicable, not squamous cell carcinoma of skin of eyelid

Not applicable:  Information not collected for this case
(May include cases converted from code 888 used in CSv1 for "Not applicable" or when the item was not collected.  If this item is required to derive T, N, M, or any stage, use of code 988 may result in an error.)
No histologic examination of primary site

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
